questions_and_notes: Since it is stored on rho surfaces, not depth, I don't think cell_methods should include "depth".  For longitude, check whether sum is correct and consistent with msftyrho-Omon, msftyz-Odec, msftyz-Omon msftyrhompa-Omon, and msftyzmpa-Omon.  cell_methods should include "where sea" .
cell_methods: longitude: rho: sum where sea (along a zig-zag grid path spanning a basin) time: mean
comment: Overturning mass streamfunction arising from all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.
